definitions: the practice or principle of giving a group priority over each individual in it

examples.text: the Church has criticized the great emphasis placed on individualism rather than collectivism

shortDefinitions: practice or principle of giving group priority over each individual in it

definitions: the theory and practice of the ownership of land and the means of production by the people or the state

examples.text: the Russian Revolution decided to alter the course of modernity towards collectivism

shortDefinitions: ownership of land and means of production by people or state
